attributes.action: Debate in parliament the sale of BWML by the Canal & River Trust.
attributes.background:
BWML is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Canal & River Trust that is being sold to the private sector.This includes the sale of 18 marinas and the berths of 2,500 boats.
We want each marina to be turned into a Trust for the residents to manage as a co-operative. Keeping boating in the hands of boaters.

rejection.details: The Canal and River Trust is a charity, not a public body.
